data.text:
I recently set up a new brand for streaming etc. And would be great to be able to align my characters name without having to recreate on an official server and lose everything.

Is this something we could possibly see in future updates or will it always be a recreate situation?

It would be cool indeed, just like we are able to change the names of our clan and thralls.
